description:
"This is a market on whether Max Verstappen or Charles Leclerc will be the higher placed finisher at the 2022 Hungarian Grand Prix, which takes place over 70 laps of the 4.381-kilometre Hungaroring in Budapest on Sunday, July 31.

The market will resolve to “Verstappen” if Max Verstappen finishes ahead of Charles Leclerc, and “Leclerc” if Charles Leclerc finishes ahead of Max Verstappen. 

Note:
- If Max Verstappen finishes the race but Charles Leclerc does not, or does not compete at all, the market will resolve to “Verstappen”. 
- If Charles Leclerc finishes the race but Max Verstappen does not, or does not compete at all, the market will resolve to “Leclerc”. 
- If neither Charles Leclerc nor Max Verstappen finish the race before August 7 (11:59 PM ET), then the market will resolve to 50-50. 
- If for any reason the 2022 Hungarian Grand Prix is rescheduled to a different time and date on or before August 7, 2022, the same market conditions will apply. If the race is rescheduled to a time and date after August 7, 2022, this market will resolve to 50-50."

events.title: Formula 1: Who will finish ahead at the 2022 Hungarian Grand Prix, Max Verstappen or Charles Leclerc?
